extra.enrollment_requirement: Exclusion No more than 6.0 units from CHEM497; CHEM498; CHEM499

basic.description: A Fall Term research project on a topic in chemistry, supervised by a member of staff. Normally limited to students in the final year of a major or subject of specialization concentration in Chemistry; where appropriate, students in a  Chemistry Medial program may take the course with permission of the Department. Additional restrictions may apply.
basic.subject: CHEM
basic.title: Research Project I
